entry.title: Surprising Limits Discovered in Quest for Optimal Solutions
entry.content: Algorithms that zero in on solutions to optimization problems are the beating heart of machine reasoning. New results reveal surprising limits.

entry.title: The Uselessness of Useful Knowledge
entry.content: Today’s powerful but little-understood artificial intelligence breakthroughs echo past examples of unexpected scientific progress.

entry.title: Neuron Bursts Can Mimic Famous AI Learning Strategy
entry.content: A new model of learning centers on bursts of neural activity that act as teaching signals — approximating backpropagation, the algorithm behind learning in AI.

entry.title: A New Link to an Old Model Could Crack the Mystery of Deep Learning
entry.content: To help them explain the shocking success of deep neural networks, researchers are turning to older but better-understood models of machine learning.
